sentences.sContent: Arthur Davies sings the tenor solo.
sentences.sCn: 阿瑟•戴维斯表演男高音独唱。

synos.tran: 男高音；要旨，大意；[金融]票据的限期；稳定的进程

words.tran: 唱次中音者；男高音歌手

trans.tranCn: 男高音；要旨，大意；票据的限期；稳定的进程
trans.tranOther: a male singing voice that can reach the range of notes below the lowest woman’s voice, or a man with a voice like this
a tenor voice or instrument has a range of notes that is lower than an  alto  voice or instrument
